onyomiExamples.meaning: list price, regular price, established price
fixed number (of people), prescribed number (of regular personnel, students, etc.), quota, numerical limit, complement, capacity (of a bus, boat, theatre, etc.), seating capacity
revision (of a rule, price, etc.), alteration, change
certainty, reality, actuality, regular, permanent, samadhi (state of intense concentration achieved through meditation)
revision (of a rule, price, etc.), alteration, change

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to decide, to determine, to establish, to lay down, to prescribe, to provide, to stipulate, to bring peace (to), to make peaceful
to become settled, to be fixed
